definition: (dialect) to cook in salt or sand, inside a sealed pot/to steam/to bake
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc
to condition or dye the hair using hair treatment product in conjunction with a hair steamer

sentences.english: Toast walnut kernels in medium hot oven, remove and cool.
sentences.chinese: 合桃肉放焗炉内，用中火焗至金黄，取出待冻。

sentences.english: Toast walnut kernels in medium hot oven, remove and cool.
sentences.chinese: 合桃肉放焗炉内，用中火焗至金黄，取出待冻。

sentences.english: Add slab sugar to taste, decorate with walnut kernels.
sentences.chinese: 加片糖调味，以焗香原粒合桃肉装饰。

sentences.english: Heat up oil in clay pot. Stir-fry ginger slices till fragrant. Add chicken pieces and cook for 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 砂锅下油烧热，放入姜片爆香，加入鸡件焗5分钟。

sentences.english: When rice cooked, add chopped parsley and let rest for 5 minutes and serve.
sentences.chinese: 饭熟后，加入洋芫荽拌匀，继续焗5分钟即成。

sentences.english: Luckily our cellar was still full of potatoes, so we lived on potatoes with salt.
sentences.chinese: 幸好地窖里存满了马铃薯，于是我们以盐焗土豆为食。

sentences.english: Preheat gas oven to 180℃ and grease a cookies sheet.
sentences.chinese: 预热煤气焗炉至摄氏180℃，把焗盘扫油。

sentences.english: Preheat gas oven to 180℃ and grease a cookies sheet.
sentences.chinese: 预热煤气焗炉至摄氏180℃，把焗盘扫油。

sentences.english: Use the simmer burner rather than the oven to reheat food.
sentences.chinese: 加热食物时，应选用慢火炉头以代替焗炉。

sentences.english: Baked Tournedos of Salmon, Caviar, Olysters with Parma Ham.
sentences.chinese: 焗三文鱼，鱼子酱，生蚝配帕尔马火腿。

sentences.english: Slice the pork, mix up the dipping sauce and serve.
sentences.chinese: 取出焗好的猪颈肉切件，把汁料材料拌匀即可伴食。

sentences.english: Bake the batter for 10-12 minutes, then turn out the cake and leave to cook.
sentences.chinese: 把面糊放入焗炉焗10至12分钟，焗好后取出放凉。

sentences.english: Bake the batter for 10-12 minutes, then turn out the cake and leave to cook.
sentences.chinese: 把面糊放入焗炉焗10至12分钟，焗好后取出放凉。

sentences.english: Bake the batter for 10-12 minutes, then turn out the cake and leave to cook.
sentences.chinese: 把面糊放入焗炉焗10至12分钟，焗好后取出放凉。

definition: soy sauce (chiefly in Cantonese and Hakka areas)
to cook slowly over a low flame/pot/saucepan
